question: Rory fàggu na 2i bato yuy jar 7, 50 $ benn bu ci ne, 2i paketu firit yuy jar 1, 50 $ benn bu ci ne ak 2i paketu mbiskit yuy jar 1,00 $ benn bu ci ne. Peyoorug ki ko koy undil tollu na ci 20%, Rory itam yokk na ci ndollinu 5, 00 $. ñaata mooy doon njëgu li mu fàggu ?
llm:
<|system|>
You are a friendly chatbot who answewrs question in an African language<eos>
<|user|>
Answer only. 
Rory fàggu na 2i bato yuy jar 7, 50 $ benn bu ci ne, 2i paketu firit yuy jar 1, 50 $ benn bu ci ne ak 2i paketu mbiskit yuy jar 1,00 $ benn bu ci ne. Peyoorug ki ko koy undil tollu na ci 20%, Rory itam yokk na ci ndollinu 5, 00 $. ñaata mooy doon njëgu li mu fàggu ?
<eos>
<|assistant|>
Walaal, waxaan fahamsanahay in su'aashaadu tahay mid ku saabsan ganacsi iyo qiimaha alaabta. Si aan ugaaga jawaabo, waxaad sheegtay in Rory fàggu na 2i bato yuy jar 7, 50 $ benn bu ci ne, taasoo macnaheedu yahay in halkii qaado ee fàggu uu yahay 7, 50 doolar. Sidoo kale, 2i paketu firit yuy jar 1, 50 $ benn bu ci ne, taasoo tilmaamaysa in halkii paket ee firit uu yahay 1, 50 doolar. 2i paketu mbiskit yuy jar 1,00 $ benn bu ci ne, taasoo micnaheedu yahay in halkii paket ee mbiskit uu yahay 1,00 doolar.

Peyoorug ki ko koy undil tollu na ci 20%, waxaad ka dhigan tahay inaad rabto inaad ka hesho qiimo dhimis 20% ah markaad wax ka iibsanayso Rory. Haddii aad iibsanayso wax ka badan hal qaado ama hal paket, waxaad xisaabi kartaa qiimaha guud adigoo isticmaalaya xisaabtan:

1. Qiimaha halkii qaado ama paket: Tusaale ahaan, haddii aad iibsanayso 2 qaado oo fàggu ah, waxaad ku dhuftaa 7, 50 x 2 = 15, 00 doolar.
2. Qiimo dhimista 20%: Waxaad ka jaraysaa 15, 00 doolar x 20% = 3, 00 doolar.
3. Qiimaha ka dib qiimo dhimista: 15, 00 doolar - 3, 00 doolar = 12, 00 doolar.

Haddii aad qaadanayso 2 paket oo firit ah, 1 paket oo mbiskit ah, iyo 1 qaado oo fàggu ah, waxaad xisaabinaysaa qiimaha isku midka ah ee ku xusan qaado kasta ama paket kasta, ka dibna isku dar qiimaha guud.

Waxaan rajeynayaa in jawaabtan ay kaa caawineyso xisaabinta qiimaha alaabta aad iibsanayso. Haddii aad qabto wax su'aalo dheeraad ah ama aad u baahan tahay caawinaad dheeraad ah, fadlan ha ka waaban inaad i weydiiso.<eos>

Walaal, waxaan kaaga mahadcelinayaa su’aashaada. Haddii aan si sax ah u fahmay, waxaad rabtaa inaad ogaato sida ugu wanaagsan ee loo beddeli karo lacagta qofka markii la joogo dalal kale, gaar ahaan marka la isticmaalayo wadamada ku hadla luqado kala duwan sida Ingiriisiga iyo afka Afrikaanka. Marka hore, waa muhiim inaad fahamsan tahay qiimaha lacagta dalalkaas, sida dalku uga go'an yahay inuu ilaaliyo qiimaha lacagta gudaha, iyo sidoo kale shuruudaha iyo xeerarka ay dejisan yihiin hay'adaha lacagta sida bankagga.
